items.sentence: Why do you think that I would do something like that?
Tom doesn\'t necessarily have to go there by himself.
I can\'t imagine losing a loved one on Christmas Day.
I can\'t let you talk about your own father that way.
Tom told Mary that he couldn\'t allow her to do that.
I used to dream about being a successful businessman.
Tom doesn\'t seem to be interested in making friends.
I\'m certain there are many other things we could do.
I\'m really sorry. I seem to have lost your umbrella.
Tom told Mary he didn\'t have many friends in Boston.
